ServerGroup.Name: Special Settings It Takes A Village

Server.Name: Special Settings It Takes A Village
Server.Description:
Use this modlet adjust certain settings for "It Takes A Village".
Current settings included: - Maximal number of professions each player can acquire.
A server side A20.x modlet that does not require disabling of EAC. Only the host needs to have the mod in their Mods folder. Last updated: v.1 - July 31th 2022 by Khym and Pesmax
